configurable.i18n_description: Revel in the retro cool of 7 For all Mankind’s indigo stripe short romper. The romper exudes a romantic 70’s look with effortless style. The slim shoulder straps with an exposed white zip front and wide waistband all create an ultra feminine silhouette with playful, modern retro appeal.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Revel in the retro cool of 7 For all Mankind’s indigo stripe short romper. The romper exudes a romantic 70’s look with effortless style. The slim shoulder straps with an exposed white zip front and wide waistband all create an ultra feminine silhouette with playful, modern retro appeal.

configurable.i18n_product_details:
• Measurements based on Size 27
  • Approx. inseam: 3 in
  • Rise: Front: 12 1/2 in
  • Leg opening: 28in
  • Measurements may vary based on size, fabric and wash
  • 97% Cotton 3% Elastane
